rows.translation: When the sky is rent asunder,

bismillah.translation: In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful.

rows.translation: And hearkens to (the Command of) its Lord, and it must needs (do so);-
And when the earth is flattened out,
And casts forth what is within it and becomes (clean) empty,
And hearkens to (the Command of) its Lord,- and it must needs (do so);- (then will come Home the full reality).

rows.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ إِنَّكَ كَادِحٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ كَدْحًا فَمُلَـٰقِيهِ
rows.translation: O thou man! Verily thou art ever toiling on towards thy Lord- painfully toiling,- but thou shalt meet Him.
rows.transliteration: yā-ayyuhal-insānu innaka kādiḥun ilā rabbika kad-ḥan famulāqīh

rows.translation: Then he who is given his Record in his right hand,
Soon will his account be taken by an easy reckoning,
And he will turn to his people, rejoicing!

rows.arabic: وَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِىَ كِتَـٰبَهُۥ وَرَآءَ ظَهْرِهِۦ
rows.translation: But he who is given his Record behind his back,-
rows.transliteration: wa-ammā man ūtiya kitābahu warā-a ẓahrih

rows.translation: Soon will he cry for perdition,
And he will enter a Blazing Fire.
Truly, did he go about among his people, rejoicing!
Truly, did he think that he would not have to return (to Us)!

rows.arabic: بَلَىٰٓ إِنَّ رَبَّهُۥ كَانَ بِهِۦ بَصِيرًا
rows.translation: Nay, nay! for his Lord was (ever) watchful of him!
rows.transliteration: balā inna rabbahu kāna bihi baṣīrā

rows.translation: So I do call to witness the ruddy glow of Sunset;
The Night and its Homing;
And the Moon in her fullness:
Ye shall surely travel from stage to stage.
What then is the matter with them, that they believe not?-

rows.arabic: وَإِذَا قُرِئَ عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلْقُرْءَانُ لَا يَسْجُدُونَ ۩
rows.translation: And when the Qur'an is read to them, they fall not prostrate,
rows.transliteration: wa idhā quri-a `alayhimul qur-ānu lā yasjudūn ۩

rows.translation: But on the contrary the Unbelievers reject (it).
But Allah has full knowledge of what they secrete (in their breasts)
So announce to them a Penalty Grievous,

rows.arabic: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ لَهُمْ أَجْرٌ غَيْرُ مَمْنُونٍۭ
rows.translation: Except to those who believe and work righteous deeds: For them is a Reward that will never fail.
rows.transliteration: illal ladhīna āmanū wa`amiluṣ ṣāliḥāti lahum ajrun ghayru mamnūn
